name: Bubble Beats
description:
A typing game with bubbles! Help Grape Jam Jim pop off in this fiendish finger flexer. Keep up with Mean Tangerine by typing as quickly and accurately as you can before the song ends. Typing depletes your health, stay afloat by making as little mistakes as you can. Finishing words wins your health back! Spelling words right on the first go gets you bonus health points.

Made for minijam 84. Thanks for playing! - InTheWall Team
